Reviews.Content: Beautiful vistas at this charming retreat! I highly recommend this beautiful hideaway to anyone traveling to Florence or Tuscany in general. The hosts are very friendly, and try very hard on their English.The views were breathtaking - it is incredible to stay in the countryside surrounded by such rustic charm.The rooms were clean and well-kept.It is a wonderful place to stay for a family since the rates are relatively low; we rented the entire house for not too much. It would also be ideal for a honeymoon as long as you pick the master suite. Otherwise you may have to share a bathroom with someone else, which I think hampers the romance a bit.The hosts will pick you up and take you to the train whenever you want to go into Florence. Otherwise you may want to rent a car to see the rest of the Tuscan countryside.YOU MUST go to the restaurant they recommend nearby, by far this restaurant (I forgot the name) has the best food I have ever had in my entire life, and I travel a lot.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
